place.name: UPTON SCUDAMORE
place.gazetteerText: UPTON-SCUDAMORE, a parish in Warminster district, Wilts; 1½ mile NNW of Warminster r. station. Post town, Warminster. Acres, 2,503. Real property, £2,787. Pop., 381. Houses, 86. The living is a rectory in the diocese of Salisbury. Value, £456.* Patron, Queen's College, Oxford. The church was rebuilt in 1859. There is a national school. Owen, the author of "Geoponica," was rector. (In 1870-72, John Marius Wilson's Imperial Gazetteer of England and Wales)
